name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE & REVENUE. v. JUBILEE KNITTING MILLS, INC., Appellant
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth v. Jubilee Knitting Mills, Inc.

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, POME-ROY, NIX and MANDERINO, J J.
ROBERTS, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
NIX, J., concurs in the result.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE & REVENUE. v. JUBILEE KNITTING MILLS, INC., Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Order affirmed 9 Pa.Cmwlth. 602, 309 A.2d 161. See Commonwealth v. Weldon Pajamas, Inc., 432 Pa. 481, 248 A.2d 204 (1968).
ROBERTS, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
NIX, J., concurs in the result.
JONES, C. J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Lewis H. Markowitz, Richard C. Fox, York, Markowitz, Kagen & Griffith, for appellant.
Eugene J. Anastasio, Deputy Atty. Gen., Dept, of Revenue, Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
336 A.2d 879
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE & REVENUE. v. JUBILEE KNITTING MILLS, INC., Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 22, 1974.
Decided May 13, 1975.
Reargument Denied July 17, 1975.
Lewis H. Markowitz, Richard C. Fox, York, Markowitz, Kagen & Griffith, for appellant.
Eugene J. Anastasio, Deputy Atty. Gen., Dept, of Revenue, Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, POME-ROY, NIX and MANDERINO, J J.
